transArray.content: The room comes with 8 bottles of mineral water. If it is not enough, you can add more water for free. The hair dryer is induction-operated. The room attendant is very enthusiastic and thoughtful, and the cleaning is very detailed. The room is satisfactory, the lights are bright, and the overall hygiene is very good. The location of the hotel is also good Great, parking is free. Convenient to travel.

Warmth and coldness are not important, what is important is that the mood is always good, gathering and separation are not important, what is important is that the friendship lasts forever, you are always there, Xiao Ji always loves.
